items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: lightweight, easy-to-use JavaScript library for securely storing data in the browser's local storage. By employing advanced encryption techniques, encrypt-storejs ensures that sensitive information is safely stored and protected against unauthorized access

items.content_html: T-manager is a lightweight web application designed for teams to collaborate on tasks efficiently. It provides an intuitive interface for task management, allowing users to create, assign, and update tasks in real-time.
